strap.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a narrow band of strong material that is used to fasten, hang, or hold onto something
strap.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The strap of my bag is broken.
strap.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to fasten something or someone in place with one or more straps
strap.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: soldiers with grenades strapped to their belts
He was only ten when he strapped on a guitar for the first time.
strap.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to tie bandages firmly round a part of your body that has been hurt
strap.translation[1].note_box[0].items[0: Strap is often used in the passive
